Text: The band Buraka Som Sistema is currently the best-known group playing kuduro, and its appearance earlier this year at Bowery Ballroom was an ecstatic, stomping success. The music combines laptops, percussion, live drummers, singers, rappers, and dancers. Buraka Som Sistema doesnât simply represent the cultures of Portugal and Angola. Its sound is one big postcolonial payback: a low-budget version of techno and house.
